com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.util

Class RequestUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.util.RequestUtils

  • public final class RequestUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility functions to use when creating a RequestBuilder.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_ENDPOINT

        public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_ENDPOINT
        Default end point for relative request. It will be updated by WatsonService with the real service end point.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
